author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police on Thursday arrested S. Abhirami (19), a housewife, after she allegedly attempted to murder her three stepchildren by trying to slit their throats with a blade. All three children were said to be out of danger.

Deputy Commissioner of Police (Crime) Disha Mittal told The Hindu that the woman was charged with Section 307 (attempt to murder) of Indian Penal Code.

Soon after committing the crime, the woman initially tried to act as if someone had entered their house at Sreenivasa Nagar and tried to murder the children, she said.

Hospitalised

A detailed inquiry revealed that Abhirami did not like the children born to her husband’s first wife and hence, tried to murder them, the police officials added.

The children were immediately hospitalised and all of them were recovering.
title: Woman attempts to murder three stepchildren
